price: Ampa sε Yεde nkyerεkyerεmu ne nyinasoͻ pefee somaa Y’asomafoͻ no, de Nwoma no ne nsania kaa wͻn ho sεdeε adasamma bɛgyina so ayε biribiara pεpεεpε, εna Yɛasiane dadeε a ano yε den papaapa na mfasoͻ pii nso wͻ so ama nnipa, sεdeε Nyankopͻn de bɛhunu obia ͻboa no ne N’asomafoͻ no wͻ kokoa mu. Nokorε sε Onyankopͻn ne Ɔhoͻdenfoͻ, Ɔne Otumfoͻ a Otumi ade nyinaa yε.
arabic: لَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلَنَا بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مَعَهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ لِيَقُومَ ٱلنَّاسُ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَأَنزَلۡنَا ٱلۡحَدِيدَ فِيهِ بَأۡسٞ شَدِيدٞ وَمَنَٰفِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥ وَرُسُلَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: laqad arsalnā rusulanā bil-bayināti wa-anzalnā maʿahumu al-kitāba wal-mīzāna liyaqūma al-nāsu bil-qis'ṭi wa-anzalnā al-ḥadīda fīhi basun shadīdun wamanāfiʿu lilnnāsi waliyaʿlama al-lahu man yanṣuruhu warusulahu bil-ghaybi inna al-laha qawiyyun ʿazīzun
translations: and so that Allah may make evident
and so that Allah may make evident
